QA.Question: What specific evidence confirms the age and identity of the singer in the video apart from the title?

Instead, it describes a performance by a young girl identified as Angelina Jordan, who is said to be 8 years old (as per the video headline). Based on this evidence, it is clear that the singer in the video is Angelina Jordan, not Amy Winehouse, and she is 8 years old during the recording of the performance.
